message.content:
```bash
🍃🌺🦋 WEEKLY Q&A 🍃🌺🦋
```
Join us every week as we answer some of the community's questions! We are still figuring out this process, so bear with this vibing chapaa until she has everything figured out.

Your lovely hosts will include none other than Game Director, <@!849859808127746118> and Community Lead, <@!786370144120209478>. We also might invite other members of the dev team to join us for answers too!

```bash
🍃🌺🦋 HOW IT WORKS 🍃🌺🦋 
```
<:purpleflower:850618727493402644>  Ask your questions in the <#851872239435644928> channel. 
<:purpleflower:850618727493402644>  Every Wednesday at 1:00PM the <#851872239435644928> channel will close to ensure we can go through all the questions.
<:purpleflower:850618727493402644>  Answered questions will be shared on Thursday in the <#851872208196206602> channel.
<:purpleflower:850618727493402644>  After the answers are shared, we will once more open the <#851872239435644928> channel for more questions!

```bash
🍃🌺🦋 FEW NOTES 🍃🌺🦋
```
We are still testing this new process out, so expect there to be change.

Given how early we are in the development process, there will be some questions we will not be able to fully answer or may not be ready to answer just yet. We'll make sure to be clear about those.

Feel free to resubmit your question if didn't get answered and the team didn't mention that it's a question we can't answer yet.
